CalculationProcedureVariable.name: CalculationProcedureVariable
CalculationProcedureVariable.description: Defines a variable in an Expression Set. The label for this object is Expression Set Variable.

ApiName.description: The API name of this variable.

CalculationMatrixName.description: The name of the Decision Matrix to which this variable belongs. Applicable only if this variable references a Decision Matrix column.

CalculationProcedureVersionId.description: The ID of the Expression Set Version to which this variable belongs.

DataType.description: The data type of this variable.

DefaultValue.description: The default value of this variable.

DisplayName.description: The user-readable name of this variable.

IsEditable.description: If true, specifies that a variable is NOT auto-imported from a step that calls a Decision Matrix or a child Expression Set.

IsUserDefined.description: Specifies whether a variable is defined by the user.

Precision.description: The number of decimal places. Applicable if the DataType is Currency, Number, or Percent.

UiDisplayOrder.description: The display order of the variable in the UI.
